P256VerificationFailed().details: Unable to verify the P256 signature, due to missing RIP-7212 P256 verifier precompile and missing Solidity P256 verifier.

N.details: The order of the secp256r1 elliptic curve.

RIP_PRECOMPILE.details: Address of the RIP-7212 P256 verifier precompile. Currently, we don't support EIP-7212's precompile at 0x0b as it has not been finalized. See: https://github.com/ethereum/RIPs/blob/master/RIPS/rip-7212.md

VERIFIER.details: Address of the Solidity P256 verifier. Please make sure the contract is deployed onto the chain you are working on. See: https://gist.github.com/Vectorized/599b0d8a94d21bc74700eb1354e2f55c Unlike RIP-7212, this verifier returns `uint256(0)` on failure, to facilitate easier existence check. This verifier will also never revert.

_HALF_N.details: `N/2`. Used for checking the malleability of the signature.
